title: wanna hear a joke ?

replies.body:
Want to hear a better joke?

Riot's balance team.

> [{quoted}](name=Seen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLjnKAzM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-07T22:17:44.291+0000)
>
> Want to hear a better joke?
> 
> Riot's balance team.

Eyyyyyyy
I am soloQ and I approve this message.

Wanna hear another joke? IE now does the same as Yasuo passive. Need more? IE is expensive as hell and overcaps 100% crit with PD on Yasuo. Want to hear another joke? Yasuo ult requires a knockup. Learn to dodge left or right.

> [{quoted}](name=DaechirYT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLjnKAzM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T20:49:13.610+0000)
>
> Wanna hear another joke? IE now does the same as Yasuo passive. Need more? IE is expensive as hell and overcaps 100% crit with PD on Yasuo. Want to hear another joke? Yasuo ult requires a knockup. Learn to dodge left or right.

You are aware that Yasuo can also ult off other champion's knockups, right?

And that he can use E + third Q on someone so that it is essentially a targeted knockup, right?
eq can overshoot. Run towards him
That sounds like the perfect way for a mage to fight a bruiser.
I won't tell you what to do after making him miss his eq. If you can't figure that out, you deserve to die. {{champion:4}}
Ah, yes. Surely his E will still be on cooldown at this point, and he definitely won't have a windwall ready.
lol {{champion:4}}
Also not like his Q has a cooldown compareable to old Eve's.

Not like TF´s damn goldcard is the most telegraphed stun in the entire game for yas to windwall x)

Lets face it, there is no mage that beats a good yasou as long as windwall exists.

the {{champion:4}} is supposed to let you know that I'm a TF player but apparently that's too hard for you to comprehend lmao

also, "a good yasuo" really? really? you aren't playing against "good yasuos" you're playing against silvers. {{champion:4}}

How does you being a TF player cause any problems with my argument at all?

You suggest to dodge Yasou´s E-3Q by moving forward, i am by mentioning that you cant stun him anyway, trying to say that even should you pull it off you still wont beat him because he will just windwall your CC and walk to your face and kill you regardless.


And for the second part of your comment,  i usually play against people ranging from gold  to diamond 1, sometimes a silver appears if they are playing together with a group or higher duo but other than that? Never.

The last few Yasou´s i played against was a Diamond, a plati and a low gold main. 

If counting the one for all game then i had a range of master to unranked. 

So, i will state it again.

Unless the Yasou is a ape who only started recently then he wont lose any ranged matchups without spamganks from enemy jungler.

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLjnKAzM,comment-id=0000000100000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-08-08T16:10:18.120+0000)
>
> How does you being a TF player cause any problems with my argument at all?

skill matchup. i wont give you a play by play. keep crying about a decent-at-best champion

https://i.imgur.com/MBp3X0W.jpg[]
Way to get like 200 down votes. Next try posting that towers are too strong and BE is too generous lol.

If the topic is Yasuo and the downvotes are many, that just means I'm right.

I do agree with the general consensus on towers and BE tho. BE is just designed to make you want to cash in that sweet instant gratification with loot boxes.

> If the topic is Yasuo and the downvotes are many, that just means I'm right.

I had to log in to UPVOTE this thing.

It makes no sense, It's retarded as hell. But its so funny!!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Dude you are by offering no context just offering nothing at all.

Go look at the TF guides written by Diamond TF players on  both lolking and mobafire, outa the 5 i checked 4 rated him to be one of the worst possible matchups.

The guy on mobafire even wrote the same as i did essentially, Yasou if good always wins that lane.

Now keyword here is lane, TF actually loses or at least cant win a number of lanes if the opponent is any good, but he wins games by roaming around in that way only he can.


So you good sir, before you tell others to get good, check your own privileges with the Diamond guys.

You do realize that E-Qing a knockup requires him to E towards you. And you can either run back or foreward while he is doing so to dodge the knockup. Yes yasuo can ult off of other champion's knockups. But there's maybe one or two champions with a non-dodgable ulti(thinking of VI atm).
{{champion:12}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:106}}
for some reasons he can even ult on knockbacks like {{champion:134}} or {{champion:119}}  E or when  a champion gets displaced by a  wall such as {{champion:48}} E
where is my pooopy ? FAIL!!!
Poppy makes you untargerable so i discluded her.
it doesnt. if you tap ult, enemies are still targetable.
Oh right forgot that mb.

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox99,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLjnKAzM,comment-id=000000010001000000000003,timestamp=2018-08-08T05:43:34.159+0000)
>
> for some reasons he can even ult on knockbacks like {{champion:134}} or {{champion:119}}  E or when  a champion gets displaced by a  wall such as {{champion:48}} E

{{champion:83}} wall and {{champion:34}} wall.
Legit anything that move you from your place count as airborne in this game, idk why
works as intended : D

>works as intended : D

not to mention he should be albe to ult on things like melee jayce Q or 3rd riven Q (i'm not sure if it was a bug that got fixed or was intended but they were considered  in air so he could),when yasuo mains say it's hard getting a knock up...pretty much everything counts as knock up
{{champion:412}}
Only blitzcrank's E is not dodgable. You can dodge all the other ones.
Not wu, nor close distance zac stuff or seju Q, nor any of xins stuff, nor Zacs Q2, and for malph and gragas ult you need flash or similar mobillity to dodge it.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLjnKAzM,comment-id=0000000100010000,timestamp=2018-08-07T21:57:24.605+0000)
>
> {{champion:12}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:106}}

He means ults that lock on to enemies in some way.

Vayne, Singed and Alistar have self buff ultimates.


Hecarim's ult is a skillshot.

Uhh, Vayne E is unit targeted. Her ultimate does not displace people. Singed fling is targeted. Alistar's headbutt is also unit targeted, and can be immediately followed up by his other displacement.

Hecarim's E is a knockback on an auto attack, which is unit targeted.
this^ Literally my E on Jayce lets a Yas be able to ult. So easy to get a Yas ult off

Learn to dodge left or right.
Minion wave comes.
Foolish Player A thinks they can farm.
Yasuo dashes from another galaxy under Player A's ass within 2 seconds and knocks them up with no skillshot.
HASAGI!

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLjnKAzM,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-08-07T22:00:24.116+0000)
>
> Learn to dodge left or right.
> Minion wave comes.
> Foolish Player A thinks they can farm.
> Yasuo dashes from another galaxy under Player A's ass within 2 seconds and knocks them up with no skillshot.
> HASAGI!

What about the Trundle who comes and only pops a pillar and Yas appears from 2 screens away
they are clearly more skillfull than u ^^

It doesn't overcap anymore and they nerfed the cost of both pd and IE.


And you try dodging yasuo E Q
I've played as yasuo and against yasuo. If you move forward when he dashes into you, you miss the q.
And how much movement speed did you have to accomplish this.

I used to main Yasuo. What the fuck is this buff for?

This is the least needed thing for Yasuo. EVEN IF they wanted to buff him, he doesn't need more damage, that isn't his issue. This is damage for the sake of damage, the fuck riot?

######Also time for his ban rate to rise by 100%######
His damage is already insane, maybe the reason his winrate is low is because he is hard to handle well.
he isnt , just picked by usually ego kids who are bad at the game and they probably would be placed 1-2 leagues lower if not playing yasuo

I think everyone at this point has understood that this season is just gonna get worse and worse.

Think about November (pre-Season)... or March, when they could still have fixed their own game. And look at the situation now.

And he is currently sitting at a 47.16% winrate platinum+
https://champion.gg/champion/Yasuo/Middle?league=

> [{quoted}](name=DinoSourRawr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLjnKAzM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-07T20:51:11.735+0000)
>
> And he is currently sitting at a 47.16% winrate platinum+
> https://champion.gg/champion/Yasuo/Middle?league=

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/current/platinum/plus/champion/Yasuo/

High skill cap champions should be around 48-49% imo.
